question: What relationship does Fred Gehrke have to the 23rd overall pick in the 2010 Major League Baseball Draft?
llm_answer: Fred Gehrke is the great-grandfather of Christian Yelich, who was the 23rd overall pick in the 2010 Major League Baseball draft.
